username_size: A felhasználónév legalább 4 és legfeljebb 32 karakter hosszú lehet
email_null: Az email cím nem lehet üres
password_pattern: A jelszónak tartalmaznia kell legalább 1 nagybetűt, egy kisbetűt és egy számot

account_activation_failure: Ez a fiók már aktiválva lett, vagy az aktiváló kód lejárt

unauthroized_user_delete: You are not authorized to delete user

unauthroized_password_reset: You are not authorized to update your password. Please follow the password reset steps again.
profile_image_size: Your profile image cannot be bigger than 2MB
unsupported_image_file: Only JPEG or PNG files are allowed
unauthorized_hoax_submit: You are not authorized to post hoax
hoax_content_size: Hoax must be min 10 and max 5000 characters
attachment_size_limit: Uploaded file cannot be bigger than 5MB
unauthorized_hoax_delete: You are not authorized to delete this hoax
